document_data.caption: The Sailors' Own stands on the far left of an aerial view of the docks.
document_data.name: The Sailors' Own
document_data.mainbody: '''The Sailors' Own''' was a rather shabby tavern near the docks in [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]].
document_data.Location: This tavern stood on [[Sail Street]], across from the mouth of [[Tarnished Silver Alley]].

Structure.Interior: The ceilings in this building were rather low-beamed.

document_data.Atmosphere:
This place was regularly crowded and filled with the smell of various, and often exotic, [[tobacco]]s.

There were often men playing some form of board game or cards and whenever a man got too drunk they were left to sleep the night through. Those who were feeling sick were expected to make their way outside of the building. And anyone who started a fight was likely to be thrown out the front door by the tavern's proprietor.
document_data.Services:
The Sailors' Own served [[horse]], [[pig|pork]], and [[oxen]] meat. They were served in either roast portions, at a price of two [[copper piece]]s per platter, or stewed with [[onion]]s and greens for a price of one copper piece per bowl.

In terms of beverages, the Sailors' Own served [[ale]] at 2 cp per tankard,

Besides the usual tavern provender, the proprietor [[Guthlakh Imyiir]] sold a variety of [[map|nautical charts]] of areas along the [[Sword Coast]] and areas around the [[Sea of Swords]] at prices ranging from 45 [[gold piece]]s and up, with his best or rare charts fetching prices upwards of hundreds.
